mapper.sql: create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", dept_id AS "deptId", pid AS "pid", pids AS "pids", simple_name AS "simpleName", full_name AS "fullName", description AS "description", version AS "version", sort AS "sort"
mapper.select: select dept_id AS id, pid as "pid", simple_name as title, ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as "spread" from sys_dept
select dept_id AS id, pid as "pid", simple_name as title, ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) as "spread" from sys_dept
select dept_id AS id, pid as "pId", simple_name as name, ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END ) as "open" from sys_dept
select dept_id AS id, pid as "pId", simple_name as name, ( CASE WHEN (pid = 0 OR pid IS NULL) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) as "open" from sys_dept

select
from sys_dept where 1 = 1
and simple_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or full_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
and (dept_id = #{deptId} or dept_id in ( select dept_id from sys_dept where pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))
order by sort ASC

from sys_dept where 1 = 1

and (dept_id = #{deptId} or dept_id in ( select dept_id from sys_dept where pids like '%[' || #{deptId} || ']%' ))
order by sort ASC
